name: src/administrative-sdk/administrative-sdk.js
AdministrativeSDK
description: Facade for all methods used in the ITSLanguage Administrative SDK.

params.name: connection
params.description: Object to use for making a connection to the REST API and Websocket server.

name: createChoiceChallenge
description:
Create a choice challenge.
It is necessary for a choice challenge to exist for a recording to be valid.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Containing the newly created object.

params.name: choiceChallenge
params.description: Object to create.

return.description: Containing the newly created object.

throws.description: {@link ChoiceChallenge#organisationId} field is required.
If the server returned an error.

name: getChoiceChallenge
description:
Get a choice challenge. A choice challenge is identified by its identifier and its {@link Organisation}'s
identifier.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Containing a ChoiceChallenge.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: Specify an organisation identifier.

params.name: challengeId
params.description: Specify a choice challenge identifier.

return.description: Containing a ChoiceChallenge.

throws.description: {@link ChoiceChallenge#id} field is required.
{@link Organisation#id} field is required.
If no result could not be found.

name: listChoiceChallenges
description: List all choice challenges in the {@link Organisation}.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Containing an array of ChoiceChallenges.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: Specify an {@link Organisation} identifier.

return.description: Containing an array of ChoiceChallenges.

throws.description: {@link Organisation#id} field is required.
If no result could not be found.

name: startStreamingChoiceRecognition
description: Start a choice recognition from streaming audio.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} A {@link https://github.com/cujojs/when} Promise containing a {@link PronunciationAnalysis}.

params.name: challenge
params.description: The choice challenge to perform.

params.name: recorder
params.description: The audio recorder to extract audio from.

params.name: trim
params.description: Whether to trim the start and end of recorded audio.

return.description: A {@link https://github.com/cujojs/when} Promise containing a {@link PronunciationAnalysis}.

throws.description: {@link ChoiceChallenge} parameter is required or invalid.
{@link ChoiceChallenge#id} field is required.
{@link ChoiceChallenge#organisationId} field is required.
If the connection is not open.
If the recorder is already recording.
If a recognition session is already in progress.
If something went wrong during analysis.

emits.description: 'ReadyToReceive' when the call is made to receive audio. The recorder can now send audio.

name: getChoiceRecognition
description: Get a choice recognition in a choice challenge.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing a ChoiceRecognition.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: Specify an organisation identifier.

params.name: challengeId
params.description: Specify a choice challenge identifier.

params.name: recognitionId
params.description: Specify a choice recognition identifier.

return.description: Promise containing a ChoiceRecognition.

throws.description: {@link ChoiceChallenge#id} field is required.
{@link Organisation#id} field is required.
{@link ChoiceRecognition#id} field is required.
If no result could not be found.

name: listChoiceRecognitions
description: List all choice recognitions in a specific {@link ChoiceChallenge}.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing an array of ChoiceRecognitions.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: Specify an organisation identifier.

params.name: challengeId
params.description: Specify a choice challenge to list speech recognitions for.

return.description: Promise containing an array of ChoiceRecognitions.

throws.description: {@link Organisation#id} is required.
{@link ChoiceChallenge#id} is required.
If no result could not be found.

params.name: organisation
params.description: Object to create.

return.description: Promise containing the newly created object.

throws.description: If the server returned an error.

description: Get an organisation.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing an Organisation.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: Specify an organisation identifier.

return.description: Promise containing an Organisation.

throws.description: {@link Organisation#id} field is required.
If no result could not be found.

description: List all organisations.

name: startStreamingPronunciationAnalysis
description: Start a pronunciation analysis from streaming audio.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} A {@link https://github.com/cujojs/when} Promise containing a {@link PronunciationAnalysis}.

params.name: challenge
params.description: The pronunciation challenge to perform.

params.name: recorder
params.description: The audio recorder to extract audio from.

params.name: trim
params.description: Whether to trim the start and end of recorded audio (default: true).

return.description: A {@link https://github.com/cujojs/when} Promise containing a {@link PronunciationAnalysis}.

throws.description: If challenge is not an object or not defined.
If challenge has no id.
If challenge has no organisationId.
If the connection is not open.
If the recorder is already recording.
If a session is already in progress.
If something went wrong during analysis.

emits.description: 'ReadyToReceive' when the call is made to receive audio. The recorder can now send audio.

When the sent audio has finished alignment. Aligning audio is the process of mapping the audio
to spoken words and determining when what is said. An object is sent containing a property 'progress',
which is the sent audio alignment, and a property 'referenceAlignment' which is the alignment of the
reference audio.

name: getPronunciationAnalysis

params.name: organisationId

params.name: analysisId

throws.description: {@link PronunciationChallenge#id} field is required.
{@link PronunciationChallenge#organisationId} field is required.
{@link PronunciationAnalysis#id} field is required.
If no result could not be found.

params.description:
Specify a pronunciation challenge identifier to list
speech recordings for.

params.name: detailed
params.description: Returns extra analysis metadata when true.

return.description: Promise containing a list of PronunciationAnalyses.

throws.description: {@link PronunciationChallenge#id} field is required.
{@link PronunciationChallenge#organisationId} field is required.
If no result could not be found.

name: constructor
description: Create a choice challenge domain model.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: The {@link Organisation} identifier this challenge is an entry in.

params.name: id
params.description: The {@link ChoiceChallenge} identifier. If none is given, one is generated.

params.name: question
params.description: A hint or question related to the choices.

params.name: choices
params.description: The sentences of which at most one may be recognised.

throws.description: {@link Organisation#id} parameter of type "string" is required.
id parameter of type "string|null|undefined" is required.
id parameter should not be an empty string.
question parameter of type "string|null|undefined" is required.
non-empty choices parameter is required.
choices parameter of type "string|object Array" is required.
no numbers allowed in choices.

name: src/administrative-sdk/connection/connection-controller.js
Connection
description: Controller class for managing connection interaction.

params.name: options
params.description:
Options to configure the connection with.
Valid options include:
* apiUrl - The URL of the REST api.
* wsUrl - The URL of the Websocket server.
* oAuth2Token - An OAuth2 token string.
* adminPrincipal - The username of the admin account.
* adminPassword - The password of the admin account.

name: addEventListener
description: Add an event listener. Listens to events emitted from the websocket server connection.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handler function to add.

name: removeEventListener
description: Remove an event listener of the websocket connection.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handler function to remove.

name: fireEvent
description: Fire an event.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: args
params.description: Arguments.

name: _getAuthHeaders
description: Assemble a HTTP Authentication header.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing an authorization header string.

return.description: Promise containing an authorization header string.

throws.description: If the oAuth2Token in {@link Connection#settings} is not set.

name: webSocketConnect
description: Create a connection to the websocket server.

name: _secureAjaxGet
description: Perform a HTTP GET to the API using authentication.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing a result.

params.name: url
params.description: Url to retrieve.

return.description: Promise containing a result.

throws.description: If the server returned an error.

name: _secureAjaxPost
description: Perform a HTTP POST to the API using authentication.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing a result.

params.name: url
params.description: Url to submit to.

params.name: formdata
params.description: The form to POST.

return.description: Promise containing a result.

throws.description: If the server returned an error.

name: _secureAjaxDelete
description: Perform a HTTP DELETE to the API using authentication.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing a result.

params.name: url
params.description: Url to submit to.

return.description: Promise containing a result.

throws.description: If the server returned an error.

name: addAccessToken
description: Add an access token to the given URL.

unknown.tagValue: {string} An url with the access token appended.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL to add an access token to.

return.description: An url with the access token appended.

name: _sdkCompatibility
description: Logs browser compatibility for required and optional SDK capabilities.

throws.description: In case of compatibility issues.

name: cancelStreaming
description: Cancel any current streaming audio recording.

params.name: recorder
params.description: The audio recorder currently recording.

name: logRPCError
description: Log an error caught from an RPC call.

params.name: result
params.description: Error object.

name: getOauth2Token
description: Ask the server for an OAuth2 token.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Promise containing a access_token, token_type and scope.

params.name: basicAuth
params.description: Basic Auth to obtain credentials from.

params.name: organisationId
params.description: Id of the organisation to request a token for.

params.name: studentId
params.description: Id of the student to request a token for.

return.description: Promise containing a access_token, token_type and scope.

throws.description: If the server returned an error.

name: src/administrative-sdk/phoneme/phoneme.js
constructor
description: Create a phoneme domain model.

params.name: ipa
params.description: The pronunciation of the grapheme(s) indicated as International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

params.name: score
params.description:
The audio is scored per phoneme and consists of several measurements. 0 would be bad,
1 the perfect score.

params.name: confidenceScore
params.description:
This value provides a reliable prediction that the pronounced phoneme is
actually the phoneme that is supposed to be pronounced. There is no absolute scale defined yet.

params.name: verdict
params.description:
Bad when the score is below 0.4, moderate when equal to 0.4 or between 0.4 and 0.6.
good when the score is 0.6 or above.

description: The most recent update date of the entity.

name: audioUrl
description: The audio fragment as streaming audio link.

name: audio
description: The recorded audio fragment.

name: score
description: The average score of all phonemes grading the entire attempt.

name: confidenceScore
description:
This value provides a reliable prediction that the pronounced phonemes are
actually the phonemes that are supposed to be pronounced. There is no absolute scale defined yet.

name: words
description: The spoken sentence, split in graphemes per word.

name: src/administrative-sdk/word-chunk/word-chunk.js

unknown.tagValue: WordChunk domain model

name: constructor
description: Create a word chunk domain model.

params.name: graphemes
params.description: The graphemes this chunk consists of.

params.name: score
params.description:
The audio is scored per grapheme and consists of several measurements. 0 would be bad,
1 the perfect score.

params.name: verdict
params.description:
Bad when the score is below 0.4, moderate when equal to 0.4 or between 0.4 and 0.6.
good when the score is 0.6 or above.

params.name: phonemes
params.description: The phonemes this chunk consists of.

name: src/audio/audio-player.js
AudioPlayer
description: ITSLanguage AudioPlayer non-graphical component.

name: constructor
description: Construct an AudioPlayer for playing .wav or .mp3 files.

params.name: options
params.description: Override any of the default settings.

emits.description: 'playbackstopped' When playback has ended, been stopped or been paused.
All events the HTML5 Audio also fires. {@link http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_av_dom.asp}

name: resetEventListeners
description: Turn off all event listeners for this player.

name: addEventListener
description: Add an event listener. Listens to events emitted from the player.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handler function to add.

name: removeEventListener
description: Remove an event listener of the player.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handler function to remove.

name: _playbackCompatibility
description:
Check for mandatory browser compatibility.
Logs detailed browser compatibilities related to for audio playback.

throws.description: If no native wave or MP3 playback is available.

name: _getBestPlayer
description:
Get a player object that performs audio compression, when available.

Using the Media Stream Recording API for recording is the preferred
solution. It allows recording compressed audio which makes it quicker to
submit. If not available, use a default createScriptProcessor is used.

params.name: callbacks
params.description: Callbacks to add to the chosen player.

name: load
description: Preload audio from an URL.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL that contains the audio.

params.name: preload
params.description:
Try preloading metadata and possible some audio. Set to false to not download
anything until playing.

params.name: loadedCb
params.description:
The callback that is invoked when the duration of the audio file
is first known.

emits.description: 'canplay' When the player is ready to play.

name: reset
description: Unload previously loaded audio. Stops the player and any stopwatch.

name: play
description: Start or continue playback of audio. Also starts the stopwatch at the given position.

params.name: position
params.description: When position is given, start playing from this position (seconds).

name: stop
description: Stop playback of audio. Stops and resets the stopwatch.

name: pause
description: Pause playback of audio. Stops the stopwatch.

name: togglePlayback
description: Toggle audio playback. Switch from playing to paused state and back.

name: preload
description: Start preloading audio.

name: scrub
description: Start playing audio at the given offset. Corrects a percentage under 0 or above 100 to the respective values.

params.name: percentage
params.description: Start at this percentage (0..100) of the audio stream.

name: getBufferFill
description: Returns the percentage of which the buffer is filled.

unknown.tagValue: {number} Percentage of buffer fill.

return.description: Percentage of buffer fill.

name: getCurrentTime
description: Returns the current playing time as offset in seconds from the start.

unknown.tagValue: {number} Time in seconds as offset from the start.

return.description: Time in seconds as offset from the start.

name: getDuration
description: Returns the total duration in seconds.

unknown.tagValue: {number} Time in seconds of fragment duration.

return.description: Time in seconds of fragment duration.

name: isPlaying
description: Check if there is playback in progress.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if user is currently playing audio. False otherwise.

return.description: True if user is currently playing audio. False otherwise.

name: canPlay
description: Returns ready state of the player.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} True when player is ready to start loading data or play. False when no audio is loaded
or the player is preparing.

return.description:
True when player is ready to start loading data or play. False when no audio is loaded
or the player is preparing.

name: bindStopwatch
description: Bind a stopwatch to sync with the playing and stopping functionality of the player.

unknown.tagValue: {Stopwatch} New Stopwatch object.

params.name: tickCb
params.description: Callback to invoke on every tick. A tick occurs once every 100 ms.

return.description: New Stopwatch object.

throws.description: If _tickCb is null.

name: src/audio/audio-recorder.js
AudioRecorder
description: Audio recording component.

name: constructor
description: ITSLanguage AudioRecorder.

params.name: options
params.description: Override any of the default settings.

name: removeAllEventListeners
description: Turn off all event listeners for this recorder.

name: addEventListener
description: Add an event listener. Listens to events emitted from the recorder.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handler function to add.

name: removeEventListener
description: Remove an event listener of the recorder.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handler function to remove.

name: fireEvent
description: Fire an event.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: args
params.description: Arguments.

name: hasUserMediaApproval
description: Check if the user has already given permission to access the microphone.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if user has granted access to the microphone. False otherwise.

return.description: True if user has granted access to the microphone. False otherwise.

name: _recordingCompatibility
description:
Logs browser compatibility for audio recording.
In case of compatibility issues, an error is thrown.

name: requestUserMedia
description:
Request microphone access.

Calling this function may result in thrown exceptions when browser
doesn't support provide live audio input.

throws.description: If no live audio input is available or permitted.

name: _startUserMedia
description: Audio access was granted, start analysing.

params.name: stream
params.description: Media Stream.

name: _getBestRecorder
description:
Get a recorder object that performs audio compression, when available.

Using the Media Stream Recording API for recording is the prefered
solution. It allows recording compressed audio which makes it quicker to
submit. If not available, use a default createScriptProcessor is used.

params.name: micInputGain
params.description: The GainNode to analyze.

name: streamCallback
description: Called when a chunk of audio becomes available.

params.name: chunk
params.description: A chunk of audio (Int16 formatted).

name: _requireGetUserMedia
description: Throw an error if the user is not yet logged in.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True when permission was already granted. False otherwise.

return.description: True when permission was already granted. False otherwise.

name: startRecordingSession
description: Set a new recording session id.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The id that was given or a unique generated one.

params.name: id
params.description: When defined, stick this id to the recorded blob.

return.description: The id that was given or a unique generated one.

name: record
description: Start recording microphone input until stopped.

params.name: cb
params.description:
The callback that provides a piece of raw audio when
it becomes available. It may be used for streaming.

name: stop
description: Stop recording microphone input.

params.name: forced
params.description: Set whether to force the microphone to stop recording or let it end normally.

emits.description: 'recorded' With arguments: [recording ID, audio Blob, forced].

name: isRecording
description: Check if there is a recording in progress.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if user is currently recording audio. False` otherwise.

return.description: True if user is currently recording audio. False` otherwise.

name: toggleRecording
description: Toggle audio playback. Switch from playing to paused state and back.

name: getAudioSpecs
description: Get the recorded audio specifications.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} Containing audioFormat and audioParameters describing the format.

return.description: Containing audioFormat and audioParameters describing the format.

name: bindStopwatch
description: Bind a stopwatch to sync with the playing and stopping functionality of the recorder.

unknown.tagValue: {Stopwatch} New Stopwatch object.

params.name: tickCb
params.description: Callback to invoke on every tick. A tick occurs once every 100 ms.

return.description: New Stopwatch object.

throws.description: If _tickCb is null.

name: constructor
description: Represents a volume meter.

params.name: audioContext
params.description: The WebAudio context.

params.name: inputStream
params.description: The MediaStream to analyze.

name: getVolumeIndication
description: Start analysing the audio stream and provide updates to the specified callback function.

params.name: callback
params.description:
This function is called when there's a new volume reading is available.
First parameter is the volume.

params.name: args
params.description: Optional array of parameters to pass to the callback after the volume parameter.

name: _updateAnalysers
description:
Calculate the volume, inform listeners by executing the callback.
Repeat indefinitely.

name: stopAnalyser
description: Stop calculating the volume.

name: src/audio/cordova-media-recorder.js
CordovaMediaRecorder
description:
Use the Cordova Media recorder for recording and encoding audio
on a WebView, wrapped in a native App.
Supports 3GPP recording on Android, WAV recording on iOS.

More information on:
https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-media/blob/master/doc/index.md

description: MediaRecorder.

name: record
description: Start recording audio.

name: isRecording
description: Is audio recording in progress.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True when recording. False otherwise.

return.description: True when recording. False otherwise.

name: stop
description: Stop recording audio.

name: getEncodedAudio
description: Request encoded audio to be returned through callback.

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback to use when returning the audio as a blob.

name: src/tools.js

unknown.tagValue: ITSLanguage Javascript
This is part of the ITSLanguage Javascript SDK to perform helper functions.
(c) 2014 ITSLanguage
MIT
d-centralize

name: Stopwatch
experimental:
When binding to an Audio Recorder, the stopwatch is not always synced properly.
A difference of 0.1s or 0.2s too high may occur when counting. When binding to an Audio Player however, the timer
will sync properly and show the correct duration of the loaded audio file.

params.name: tickCb
params.description: The callback that is invoked on every tick (every 100ms).

throws.description: If tickCb is missing.

name: start
description: Start counting and tick every 100 ms.

name: stop
description: Stop counting.

name: reset
description: Reset count to 0.

name: update
description: Tick once and increment the value by 1.

name: tick
description: Invoke the tick callback with the current value.
